WEATHER FORECAST FOR 16 JULY 2024
Issued at 12.00 noon on 15 July 2024
The prevailing  windy conditions over the island are expected to continue further, due to the active South
West Monsoonal condition.
S
column2: howers or thundershowers will occur at times in Western, Sabaragamuwa and North-western provinces and
